name: Glidch
description:
Turn your sound up, relax. Full-Screen it for fullness.

 Use only LEFT and RIGHT or A and D keys to guide your flight.

Glide down to safety.

Enjoy.

Land safely to see your reward.

Replay value: 4 unique ransom sound tracks and 6 unique landing outcomes, 5 of which are desirable.

Requirements: 

Any 2019 mid-range Gaming  PC standard  for stutter free experience:

5300m AMD Graphics Card or Nvidia RTX 2060, GTX 1060 or something you know kind of up there could be better.

Hopefully I'll get time to optimize it and then release it for lower spec machines.
